hero.badge: Built for data, ops, and finance teams
hero.title: From data to decisions with agentic AI
hero.lead: AgentProvision connects your lakehouse and SaaS data so every leader gets real-time answers and automated follow-through.
hero.subtext: Auto-map schemas, publish governed metrics, and orchestrate AI agents that act across Snowflake, Salesforce, Netsuite, and more.
hero.subHighlight: Connect Snowflake, BigQuery, Salesforce, and more in under 30 minutes.

governedDataProducts.title: Governed data products
governedDataProducts.description: Publish curated datasets with lineage, quality scoring, and access policies baked in.

unifiedLakehouseFabric.title: Unified lakehouse fabric
unifiedLakehouseFabric.description: Blend warehouses, lakes, and streaming telemetry into one semantic layer teams can trust.

agenticAutomation.title: Agentic automation
agenticAutomation.description: Launch AI agents that read, reason, and act with guardrails across your SaaS stack.

items.label: Datasets connected
items.description: Warehouses, lakes, and SaaS APIs standardized into reusable data products.

items.label: Query-to-action time
items.description: From ad-hoc question to orchestrated agent workflow across your stack.

items.label: Manual processes automated
items.description: Agentic runbooks replace ticket queues for finance, GTM, and operations teams.

features.heading: Accelerate trusted analytics and automations
features.subtitle: Ship governed copilots faster with reusable intelligence, semantic metrics, and a collaborative workspace for data and operations leaders.

connectEverySource.title: Connect every source fast
connectEverySource.description: Onboard Snowflake, Databricks, BigQuery, Postgres, and SaaS APIs with auto-mapped schemas and freshness SLAs.

semanticControlPlane.title: Semantic control plane
semanticControlPlane.description: Publish governed metrics, policies, and lineage so dashboards and agents speak the same business language.

agentAutomationStudio.title: Agent automation studio
agentAutomationStudio.description: Design AI agents that query data, reason over context, and trigger actions in Slack, Salesforce, or custom APIs.

lakehouse.heading: Agentic lakehouse fabric
lakehouse.description: Blend operational data, telemetry, and embeddings into a unified governance plane. AgentProvision delivers ACID compliance, programmable lineage, and governed feature stores for every team.

unifiedGovernance.title: Unified governance
unifiedGovernance.description: Store tables, streams, and vector indexes in one catalog with row-level security and approvals.

programmablePipelines.title: Programmable pipelines
programmablePipelines.description: Version data products, trigger dbt jobs, and hydrate embeddings with GitOps-style workflows.

compliantCollaboration.title: Compliant collaboration
compliantCollaboration.description: Enforce regional residency, tenant isolation, masking, and auditable agent actions.

secondary.heading: Data-to-decision pipelines
secondary.description: Deploy certified pipelines that capture telemetry, execute retrieval-augmented reasoning, and trigger policy-controlled actuations.

adaptiveGuardrails.title: Adaptive Guardrails
adaptiveGuardrails.description: Runtime policy enforcement, masking, and human approval flows govern every agent step.

explainableDecisions.title: Explainable Decisions
explainableDecisions.description: Traceability bundles queries, lineage, and replayable context for auditors and owners.

lakehouseSignals.title: Lakehouse Signals
lakehouseSignals.description: Out-of-the-box dashboards track freshness, usage, and business impact across every data asset.

architecture.heading: How the platform is assembled
architecture.description: A three-layer fabric gives enterprise teams confidence from ingestion to action. Each tier is modular so you can start with the integrations you have today and scale into autonomous agents.

dataIntegrationLayer.title: Data integration layer
dataIntegrationLayer.description: Secure connectors sync lakehouse tables, SaaS data, and telemetry streams into one catalog.

semanticGovernanceLayer.title: Semantic governance layer
semanticGovernanceLayer.description: Policy engine enforces access, lineage, and quality while standardizing metrics and definitions.

agenticExecutionLayer.title: Agentic execution layer
agenticExecutionLayer.description: Composable agents orchestrate RAG, SQL, and actuator skills to automate revenue, finance, and ops workflows.

ai.heading: Operate agents with confidence
ai.description: Coordinate cross-tenant agent fleets with automated scoring, human-in-the-loop guardrails, and multi-cloud orchestration.

insightCopilots.title: Insight copilots
insightCopilots.description: Generate narrative briefings, anomaly callouts, and recommended plays on any dataset.

composableSkills.title: Composable skills
composableSkills.description: Chain SQL, RAG, code interpreters, and workflow triggers into reusable agent skills.

closedLoopActuators.title: Closed-loop actuators
closedLoopActuators.description: Sync decisions into Jira, HubSpot, ServiceNow, and ticket queues with impact tracking.

roadmap.heading: Roadmap
roadmap.subtitle: Strategic investments that expand enterprise controls, developer velocity, and observability.

marketplaceConnectors.title: Marketplace connectors
marketplaceConnectors.description: Instantly add industry data sources and agents maintained by certified partners.

adaptiveGovernanceAi.title: Adaptive governance AI
adaptiveGovernanceAi.description: Dynamic policy tuning that scores agent behavior and recommends guardrail updates.

autonomousFinopsSuites.title: Autonomous FinOps suites
autonomousFinopsSuites.description: AI orchestrators that reconcile spend, forecast usage, and trigger budget guardrails.

testimonials.heading: Teams running on AgentProvision
testimonials.subtitle: See how operators and data leaders automate decisions and close the loop faster.

items.quote: AgentProvision put every trusted dataset behind a single access plane. Our agents now surface answers and launch remediation in the same workflow.
items.author: Lina Cho
items.role: VP of Platform Engineering, Pulse Health

items.quote: We federated 700+ agent skills with centralized guardrails. Observability and policy automation keep every action compliant across regions.
items.author: Elias Grant
items.role: Head of Intelligent Automation, Nova Finance

cta.heading: Ready to launch an agentic workflow in weeks?
cta.description: Flexible enterprise pricing, white-glove onboarding, and ROI modeling tailored to your use cases.
